biotools.summary: Esc (Immune escape variants in SARS-CoV-2) is a comprehensive and manually curated compendium of genetic variants in SARS-CoV-2 associated with immune escape. The data on variants and associations have been compiled from published literature as well as preprints and includes a variety of antibodies ranging from monoclonal as well as oligoclonal and convalescent plasma panels.
